author: Craig Clarke
title: Keto Yogurt Berry Bowl
ingredients: 1 tablespoon allulose (or your preferred sweetener to taste)
instructions_list: Gather and prep all of your ingredients.
Add heavy cream and sweetener into the yogurt and stir together well.
Top with berries and enjoy immediately or refrigerate until ready to eat. Feel free to place in the freezer for 20-30 minutes prior to eating for a chilled treat!
description: This makes a total of 1 serving of Keto Yogurt Berry Bowl. The serving comes out to be 383 calories, 30g fats, 8.7g net carbs, and 17.3g protein.
